item.title: How do i change the server name and make me the owner?
item.dc:creator: @voetbal645 voetbal645
item.description:
@voetbal645 wrote:

Everyone start everywhere, so there’s no way to flame on hem. We know that there are much tutorials on how to do this.
So try to use the search bar next time.
On how to change the server name depends on what base that you are using.
To make your owner go to, data/characters and look into your file and change the rights to 3.
1= Moderator
2= Administrator
3= Owner

Read full topic
